House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.

summary.text: Redesignates the legal public holiday of Washington's Birthday as February 22 and of Memorial Day as May 30. Excludes Columbus Day as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.
